  physical_appearance: The focus scope is black in colour. At the base of the scope
 there is a silver-coloured surface where information is displayed. The numerals \u00275431\u0027
 together with the company initials \u0027LBL\u0027 and the words \u0027Deluxe Focus Scope Made in Japan\u0027 are displayed. Some discolouration can be discerned on the body of the scope.

 Singapore

  sgcool_label_text: A focus scope is a tool used to fine tune the focus of the grains of the negative in photographic film processing. This grain focuser is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm
 which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.

metadata.physical_appearance: The focus scope is black in colour. At the base of the scope, there is a silver-coloured surface where information is displayed. The numerals '5431', together with the company initials 'LBL' and the words 'Deluxe Focus Scope Made in Japan' are displayed. Some discolouration can be discerned on the body of the scope.
metadata.context_20: The set of equipment was used by The Picture Farm Pte Ltd
metadata.context_21: 45 Jalan Pemimpin, #09-00 Foo Wah Industrial Building, Thomson, Singapore
metadata.sgcool_label_text: A focus scope is a tool used to fine tune the focus of the grains of the negative in photographic film processing. This grain focuser is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm, which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.
